original_title: Sri Lanka: Fuel Prices Revised With Effect From Midnight
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Petroleum Corporation announced that fuel prices will be revised with effect from midnight on Thursday (30). The price revision per liter is as follows:
